keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Race to Escape Collapsing Laboratory
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates and their allies race through the collapsing laboratory as they feel the SAD room explosion and are pursued by Shinokuni gas.
keyMoments.significance: The crew continues their escape from Punk Hazard after successfully capturing Caesar Clown.

keyMoments.title: Franky Battles Donquixote Pirates
keyMoments.description: Franky Shogun battles Baby 5 and Buffalo at the tanker to protect Caesar and prevent his rescue by Doflamingo's forces.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' commitment to their alliance with Law and protecting their strategic advantage.

keyMoments.title: Law's Strategic Deception Revealed
keyMoments.description: Law's heart-switching deception is revealed, showing he deceived Caesar from the beginning of their partnership and saved Smoker's life.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's tactical brilliance and his genuine alliance with the Straw Hats against Doflamingo.

keyMoments.title: Buffalo Reports Failure to Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Buffalo contacts Doflamingo to report that Punk Hazard was not destroyed and Caesar was captured by the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict and brings Doflamingo directly into the action.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Personally Intervenes
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo decides to personally travel to Punk Hazard to handle the situation, showing how important Caesar and SAD are to his operations.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a major escalation and sets up the direct confrontation between Doflamingo and the Straw Hat-Law alliance.

keyMoments.title: Baby 5 Battles Franky at Tanker
keyMoments.description: Baby 5 uses her Revolver Girl technique against Franky Shogun in an attempt to rescue Caesar.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Donquixote Pirates' determination to recover Caesar and prevent their operations from being compromised.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Learns of Law's Heart Deception
keyMoments.description: Smoker questions Law about how he possessed his heart the entire time and learns about Law's deception of Caesar.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the temporary alliance between the Marines and pirates during the Punk Hazard escape.
